member.name: T:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute
member.summary: This attribute can be used in DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumns to format a column.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.CanUserReorder
member.summary: Indicates whether the user can change the column display position by dragging the column header. Default is true.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.CanUserResize
member.summary: Indicates whether the user can adjust the column width by using the mouse. Default is true.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.CanUserSort
member.summary: Indicates whether the user can sort the column by clicking the column header. Default is true.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.ClipboardContentPath
member.summary: Specifies the binding path of properties to use when getting or setting cell content for the clipboard. Default is null.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.DisplayIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the display position of the column relative to the other columns in the DataGrid. Default is -1.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.Header
member.summary: Gets or sets the column header text content. Default is null.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.HeaderStringFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format pattern to apply to the content of the column header. Default is null.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.HeaderTooltip
member.summary: Gets or sets the column header tooltip. Default is null.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.HeaderTemplateResourceKey
member.summary: A key to HeaderTemplate resource that defines layout of content bound column.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.HeaderResourceKey
member.summary: A key to Header content resource that defines layout of content bound column.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.HeaderTooltipResourceKey
member.summary: A key to Header tooltip resource that defines layout of content bound column.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.IsAutoGenerated
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the column should be auto-generated. Default is true.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether cells in the column can be edited. Default is null.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.MaxWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width constraint of the column. Default is PositiveInfinity.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.MinWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum width constraint of the column. Default is 20.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.SortDirection
member.summary: Gets or sets the sort direction (ascending or descending) of the column. Default is null;

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.SortMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets a property name, or a period-delimited hierarchy of property names, that indicates the member to sort by. Default is null.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.Visibility
member.summary: Gets or sets the visibility of the column. Default is Visible

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the column width or automatic sizing mode. Default is NaN.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.DataTemplateResourceKey
member.summary: A key to DataTemplate resource that defines layout of content bound column

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.DataGridColumnAttribute.DataEditingTemplateResourceKey
member.summary: A key to DataEditingTemplate resource that defines layout of content bound column

member.summary: Collection of objects that serves as a filter for ObservableList collection.

member.summary: Initializing constructor.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.FilteredCollection`1.SourceCollection
member.summary: Collection that serves as an original source of items.

member.summary: Checks whether the filter is active.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.FilteredCollection`1.Filter
member.summary: Items qualifier

member.name: M:Qhta.MVVM.FilteredCollection`1.SourceCollection_CollectionChanged(System.Object,System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: If then passes Reset change notification. Otherwise passes the original notification.

member.name: M:Qhta.MVVM.FilteredCollection`1.ApplyFilter
member.summary: Apply filter to all source items.

member.name: M:Qhta.MVVM.FilteredCollection`1.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Enumerates filtered items if . Otherwise enumerates original items.

member.name: M:Qhta.MVVM.FilteredCollection`1.Add(`0)
member.summary: Adds an item to the source collection, but first check the predicate and throw an exception if the item does not meet the filter condition.

member.name: M:Qhta.MVVM.FilteredCollection`1.Clear
member.summary: if then removes the filtered items from the source collection. Otherwise clears the source collection.

member.name: M:Qhta.MVVM.FilteredCollection`1.Contains(`0)
member.summary: if then checks whether filtered items contains an item. Otherwise checks whether the source collection contains an item.

member.name: M:Qhta.MVVM.FilteredCollection`1.CopyTo(`0[],System.Int32)
member.summary: if then copies filtered items to the array. Otherwise copies the source collection items.

member.name: M:Qhta.MVVM.FilteredCollection`1.Remove(`0)
member.summary: Removes the item from the source collection.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.FilteredCollection`1.Count
member.summary: if then returns filtered items count. Otherwise returns the source collection count.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.FilteredCollection`1.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Get/sets is read-only. If is not set explicitily, then checks if the source collection is read-only.
